mapper.delete: delete from admincalendar where title=#{title} and "START"='${start}'
mapper.select: select themanum, thema.themaname, count(themanum) "COUNT" from info_upload join thema using(themanum) group by themanum, thema.themaname order by 3 desc
select count(*) "info" from info_upload where infoupstatus='Y' order by infoupdate desc
select (count(*)/2) "cp" from members where status=1 and cpid is not null
select count(*) "supStatus" from members where SUPSTATUS = '1'

select * from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select infouptitle ,infoupnum, infoupdate, avg(inforeviewpoint) "ravg" from info_review join info_upload using(infoupnum) group by infoupnum, infouptitle, infoupdate )a order by 5 desc) where rnum between 1 and 5

select * from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select supnum, suplevel, sum(infouppayment) "rsum" from supporters join info_upload using(supnum) group by supnum, suplevel )a order by 4 desc) where rnum between 1 and 5
